metadata.title: CVE-2010-4653 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
An integer overflow condition in poppler before 0.16.3 can occur whenparsing CharCodes for fonts.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-4653` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xpdf - 3.02-9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xpdf package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.02-9').
